mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gt_feedback (num, goodCode, userId, content, jumsu, regdate) VALUES (gt_reply_sq.NEXTVAL, #{goodCode}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{jumsu}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT num, goodcode, userid, content, jumsu, r.regdate, r.updatedate FROM gt_feedback r, gt_product m WHERE m.goodCode=#{goodCode} ORDER BY num desc
